channel.title: Bonus on The Median Duck
channel.description: Recent content in Bonus on The Median Duck

item.title: Series 20, Bonus Content: All Tied Up
item.description: Your Task The Actual Tiebreaker Controversy Resolving the Controversy with Alternative Tiebreakers …Comes With More Controversy What Have We Learnt Today? Your Task Ba-Ba-Bonus Content and Task!!! Provide alternative series tiebreakers to the one that was actually used for the Series 20 Tiebreaker. Where possible, provide the alternative champions as a result of these alternative tiebreakers. Figure 1: Fancy seeing you here for some bonus content! The Actual Tiebreaker Controversy In Series 20, Episode 10, there was a 3-way tie for the series championship between the holy trinity of Ania, Maisie and Phil.
